hero.name: Cesar
hero.description: A passionate full stack developer dedicated to crafting exceptional, interactive, and intuitive web experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm Cesar Filho, a Software Developer with extensive experience in both frontend and backend development. I specialize in React, TypeScript, C#, MongoDB, and SQL, having contributed to strategic projects including social security management systems and Census applications.
about.additionalDescription: I excel in performance optimization, software architecture, and implementing development best practices. My expertise spans multiple frameworks including React, Vue.js, Angular, NestJS, and Entity Framework, enabling me to adapt seamlessly to diverse technology stacks.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore my portfolio of innovative solutions. Each project represents a unique challenge solved with modern technologies, thoughtful design, and attention to detail.

callToAction.title: Interested in My Work?
callToAction.description: These projects represent just a glimpse of what I can create. I'm always excited to take on new challenges and bring innovative ideas to life. Let's collaborate on your next project!

college.title: College Website
college.description: A comprehensive responsive website for a college featuring modern design, student portal, course management, and administrative tools. Built with cutting-edge technologies for optimal performance and user experience.

smartDevices.title: Smart Devices Manager
smartDevices.description: An advanced IoT management platform for controlling and monitoring smart devices through MQTT and Tuya protocols. Features real-time device status, automation rules, and comprehensive analytics dashboard.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to chat? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
